nodes.text: Docking Bay 42 was a docking bay in Meirm City on the planet Sriluur. It was there that the Shistavanen smuggler Mal Biron landed his freighter, the Eyeshine, in 3 ABY in order to host a gathering of his smuggling brethren. Many spacers, including Elis Helrot and Kal'Falnl C'ndros, were in attendance as Biron tasked them with taking on the Sisar Run.
